info.title: Web Document
info.description: This is an abstract web document manager. Manages web documents for this platform, providing a function to get the root directory to store the document.

const.name: DOC_CLASS
const.description: The main web doc content class.

prop.name: rootRelative
prop.description: Indicates whether the path must be normalized in order to be root relative.

method.name: getRootDirectory
method.description: This function should return the root directory for the document. The inner directory path will be calculated from this root folder.

parameter.name: $directory
parameter.description: The document inner directory folder.

parameter.name: $name
parameter.description: The document name. Leave empty for new documents. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $rootRelative
parameter.description: Indicates whether the path is system root relative or absolute.

method.name: create

parameter.name: $name
parameter.description: The document name.

parameter.name: $content
parameter.description: The initial document content.

parameter.name: $locale
parameter.description: The locale of the document context. If empty, it will be the current locale of the user. It is NULL by default.

parameter.name: $tableOfContents
parameter.description: Set true to add a table of contents to the document. It is TRUE by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: update

parameter.name: $content
parameter.description: The document body.

parameter.name: $locale
parameter.description: The locale of the document context. If empty, it will be the current locale of the user. It is NULL by default.

parameter.name: $tableOfContents
parameter.description: Set true to add a table of contents to the document. It is TRUE by default.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getDocumentTitle
method.description: Parse the contents of the document and save in separate file.

method.name: getDocumentContents
getDocumentInfo
method.description: Get all document info including title and contents.
method.returndescription: An array of the document info: 'title' and 'contents'.

method.name: remove
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

parameter.name: $locale
parameter.description: The locale of the document context. If empty, it will be the current locale of the user. It is NULL by default.

method.name: load
method.description: Load the entire document. The document will be loaded in the given locale. If no locale is given, the current system locale will be selected. If the document isn't translated in the current locale, it will return the system's default locale.

parameter.name: $locale
parameter.description: The locale of the document context. If empty, it will be the current locale of the user. It is NULL by default.

method.returndescription: The entire document as html document.

method.name: export
method.description: Export the document to an independent html file.

parameter.name: $locale
parameter.description: The locale to export to. If empty, it will be the current locale of the user. It is NULL by default.

method.name: getDocumentFolderName
method.description: Get the document's entire path below the root, including the document name.

parameter.name: $locale
parameter.description: The locale of the document to get the path for.

parameter.name: $extension
parameter.description: The file extension. This is used for all the files in the document object.

method.name: createDocStructure
method.description: Create the document structure for the html file.

parameter.name: $docPath
parameter.description: The document's path to save the initial structure.

method.name: resolveUrls
method.description: Resolve document urls. It currently resolves team profile urls using %{team} and %{team_shared}.

parameter.name: $document
parameter.description: The document content.

method.name: updateDocumentInfo
method.description: Updates the document info into the document xml file.

parameter.name: $parser
parameter.description: The document parser.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: updateDocumentContents
method.description: Insert the document contents in the document.

parameter.name: $parser
parameter.description: The document parser.

parameter.name: $locale
parameter.description: The document locale.
